pages.text: Each $(6)World Tier$() must be unlocked before you can enable it (except Haven, which is enabled by default).$(p)Unlocking world tiers is done by completing specific Advancements.$(p)Once a tier is unlocked, you need to activate it in the $(l:apotheosis:adventure/world_tiers/select_screen)Select Screen$().

pages.title: Foreword
pages.text: This section will cover the default requirements for unlocking world tiers.$(p)Note, modpacks may change these requirements, so be sure to reference the "Apothic World Tiers" advancements tab for complete information.

pages.title: Haven
pages.text: $(9)Haven$() is unlocked by default, though you won't be able to see it until you've picked up your first Affix Item.

pages.title: Frontier
pages.text: $(9)Frontier$() is unlocked by equipping an Affix Item in each armor slot, and holding an Affixed Weapon in either hand.

pages.title: Ascent
pages.text: Unlocking $(9)Ascent$() requires that you equip a full set of $(#33FF33)Uncommon$() Affix Items, including a weapon.$(p)You'll also need to slay an Apothic Invader.

pages.title: Summit
pages.text: Getting to $(9)Summit$() is a bit harder.$(p)You'll need to acquire a full set of $(#5555FF)Rare$() Affix Items, and have slain the Wither.

pages.title: Pinnacle
pages.text: The final tier, $(9)Pinnacle$(), requires that you not only obtain a full set of $(#BB00BB)Epic$() items, but also that you free The End.$(p)That means slaying the Ender Dragon.
